description: This source file implements the basic component object functions for a Byte Array object within the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It includes functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the byte array component, along with internal data management. The module is designed to be platform independent and appears to be part of a larger object-oriented framework simulated in C.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscByteArrayCOCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Byte Array component object, setting up its environmental context and function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscByteArrayCORemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Byte Array component object and releases associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscByteArrayCOEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls necessary subordinate objects for the Byte Array component.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscByteArrayCOInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the Byte Array object, including setting up methods and properties specific to this implementation.
